props.name: containerWidth
props.description: The maximum width of the page container.

props.name: padding
props.description: The spacing between the outer edges of the page container and the viewport

props.name: aria-label
props.description: A unique label for the rendered banner landmark

props.name: aria-labelledby
props.description: An id to an element which uniquely labels the rendered banner landmark

props.name: padding
props.description: The amount of padding inside the header.

props.name: dividerWhenNarrow
props.description: Use the divider prop with a responsive value instead.

props.name: hidden
props.type: | boolean | { narrow?: boolean regular?: boolean wide?: boolean }
props.description: Whether the header is hidden.

props.name: aria-label
props.description: A unique label for the rendered main landmark

props.name: aria-labelledby
props.description: An id to an element which uniquely labels the rendered main landmark

props.name: as
props.description: Change the root node to another HTML element or custom component.

props.name: width
props.description: The maximum width of the content region.

props.name: padding
props.description: The amount of padding inside the content.

props.name: hidden
props.type: | boolean | { narrow?: boolean regular?: boolean wide?: boolean }
props.description: Whether the content is hidden.

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Label for the pane. Required if the pane overflows and doesn't have aria-labelledby.

props.name: aria-labelledby
props.description: Id of an element that acts as a label for the pane. Required if the pane overflows and doesn't have aria-label.

props.name: width
props.type: | 'small' | 'medium' | 'large' | { min: string max: string default: string }
props.description: The width of the pane. If using custom widths, provide an object with keys 'min', 'max' and 'default'.

props.name: minWidth
props.description: The minimum width of the pane.

props.name: resizable
props.description: When true, the pane may be resized by the user.

props.name: widthStorageKey
props.description: Provide a key used by localStorage to persist the size of the pane on the client.

props.name: sticky
props.description: Whether the pane should stick to the top of the screen while the content scrolls.

props.name: offsetHeader
props.description: Use offsetHeader along with the sticky prop to push the sticky pane down to make room for a sticky header if necessary. Use the type `string` to specify the height with a unit i.e. 5rem; otherwise the type `number` will be taken as px.

props.name: padding
props.description: The amount of padding inside the pane.

props.name: dividerWhenNarrow
props.description: Use the divider prop with a responsive value instead.

props.name: hidden
props.type: | boolean | { narrow?: boolean regular?: boolean wide?: boolean }
props.description: Whether the pane is hidden.

props.name: position
props.description: Which side of the page the pane should be on. Can be changed for different viewport widths.

props.name: aria-label
props.description: A unique label for the rendered contentinfo landmark

props.name: aria-labelledby
props.description: An id to an element which uniquely labels the rendered contentinfo landmark

props.name: padding
props.description: The amount of padding inside the footer.

props.name: dividerWhenNarrow
props.description: Use the divider prop with a responsive value instead.

props.name: hidden
props.type: | boolean | { narrow?: boolean regular?: boolean wide?: boolean }
props.description: Whether the footer is hidden.
